# galaxy_sql_job (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) ID of cluster in which SQL job gets executed (read only)
- `cron_expression` (String) Cron expression which determines SQL job execution interval (read only)
- `name` (String) SQL job name (read only)
- `query` (String) SQL query to execute (read only)
- `role_id` (String) Role used when SQL job is executed (read only)

### Optional

- `description` (String) SQL job description (read only)
- `id` (String) SQL query scheduled job
- `timezone` (String) Timezone in which CRON is evaluated. Defaults to UTC (read only)

### Read-Only

- `next_execution` (String) Timestamp of SQL job next execution (read only)
- `sql_job_id` (String) ID of a SQL job (read only)
